What If_

YOU COULD PARK WITH A BIRD'S-EYE VIEW?

Back

AROUND VIEW MONITOR

The Around View Monitor not only helps you see what's behind you, it offers a virtual 360º bird's-eye view.  

Four Cameras

  • WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED

    The Around View Monitor uses not one but four cameras, allowing you to see front, back, left and right views while parking.

Bird's-eye view

  • SEE YOUR NISSAN FROM ABOVE

    Get a bird's eye vantage on your vehicle. The Around View Monitor creates a composite image from four cameras to give a single overhead view, allowing you move into parking spots with ease.

Switch views

  • PARKING CONTROL IS IN YOUR HANDS

    Need to see how close you are to the curb? The Around View Monitor lets you switch between camera inputs, making tricky parking easier.
